name: DETROIT ZOOLOGICAL SOCIETY
description: Nonprofit organization that operates the Detroit Zoo and Belle Isle Nature Zoo
sampleDescriptions: Preserving the full scope and value of the charitable giving tax deduction and urging a universal charitable deduction.
Funding for Society's projects and initiatives.  Funding for the Institute of Museum and Library Services.
Support for animal anti-trafficking and safety legislation.  Support HR 1818.  Oppose ESA legislative de-listing of gray wolves in appropriations riders.  Oppose HR 2603.  Support maintaining ESA.
Preserving the full scope and value of the charitable giving tax deduction and urging a universal charitable deduction.
Funding for Society's projects and initiatives.  Funding for the Institute of Museum and Library Services.
